shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the camera exposure area changes.

p.codeblock: public virtual void OnCameraExposureAreaChanged(int x, int y, int width, int height)
final void Function(int x, int y, int width, int height)? onCameraExposureAreaChanged;

section.props: android ios cpp unreal bp rn flutter
section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the local user changes the camera exposure position by calling .

note.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter rn cs

section.note: This callback is for Android and iOS only.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The x coordinate of the changed camera exposure area.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The y coordinate of the changed camera exposure area.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The width of the changed camera exposure area.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp unity rn cs
plentry.pd: The height of the changed exposure area.
The focus rectangle in the local preview. See .
